name: Cursed Pop-up
description:
Created by dihan and kazamor in our first-ever game jam!

Our Robot has clicked on a saucy pop-up window and is now cursed with life-sucking malware!

Seek out the legendary anti-virus to rid yourself of the curse. But be warned, the malware is constantly depleting your lifespan, so you will need to seek out patches on your journey to extend your life.  

(Hint - head to the computers!) 

Controls:

  • Jump
    • space
    • W,
    • up arrow key
    • left-click
  • Move Left/Right
    • A (left)
    • D (right)
    • left arrow key
    • right arrow key

Good luck!
